mapper.update:
update DTC_TABLE_WHITE_LIST
SOURCE_NAME = #{sourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_NUMS_PER_PAGE = #{syncNumsPerPage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_USE_PARAMS = #{isUseParams,jdbcType=CHAR},
PARAMS = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_SEQ = #{syncSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRG_TABLE_NAME = #{trgTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
